channel.title: hls on hnakamur's blog at github
channel.description: Recent content in hls on hnakamur's blog at github

item.title: video.jsのHLSライブラリを試してみた
item.description: はじめに MPEG DASHを知る - Qiita を見て、HTML5のvideoタグでHLSと Dash-Industry-Forum/dash.js: A reference client implementation for the playback of MPEG DASH via Javascript and compliant browsers. でMPEG DASHを試してみたところ
